Text: Traffic School To Go needs your help to surviveDear In our continuing fight to preserve your right to take Internet traffic school and our right to offer it to you Traffic School To Go needs your help for a minute or two Were sponsoring our own legislation AB for statewide approval and regulation of Internet traffic school so that the industry will be protected by law and available in EVERY county in California You can help us out by taking a moment to fill out a short survey This will help us assemble statistics about the effectiveness of our course Simply go to saspu and let us know how youve done since completing traffic school Thank you and may you never need us again
